entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bow Valley 11:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

Humidity: 41 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Snow level 1800 metres. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 in wind prone areas. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
